title: Here's a curated reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 that cover topics in machine reasoning and interpretable neural networks

author.literal: **"Attention is All You Need"** - Vaswani, A., et al.

title: Introduces the Transformer model, which has become foundational in many reasoning tasks

author.literal: **"Neural Algorithmic Reasoning"** - Velickovic, P., et al.

title: Discusses how neural networks can learn to perform algorithmic tasks
**"Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI): Concepts, taxonomies, opportunities and challenges toward responsible AI"** - Adadi
Provides a comprehensive overview of explainable AI methods and challenges
**"Interpretable Machine Learning: A Guide for Making Black Box Models Explainable"**
A practical guide on various techniques to make machine learning models interpretable
**"The TreeNet Model: Combining Decision Trees and Neural Networks"**
Explores combining decision trees with neural networks for improved interpretability
**"Learning to Explain: An Information-Theoretic Perspective on Model Interpretation"**
Proposes an information-theoretic approach to model interpretation

author.literal: **"Rationalizing Neural Predictions"** - Lei, T., et al.

title: Introduces a method for generating rationales for neural network predictions
**"Towards a Rigorous Science of Interpretable Machine Learning"**
Discusses the need for rigorous scientific methods in the field of interpretable machine learning
Learning Important Features Through Propagating Activation Differences"**
Introduces DeepLIFT, a method for attributing the output of a neural network to its input features

author.literal: **"Path-Specific Counterfactual Fairness"** - Kusner, M. J., et al.

title: Discusses fairness in machine learning models using counterfactual reasoning
Local Interpretable Model-Agnostic Explanations"**
Introduces LIME, a popular method for explaining the predictions of any machine learning classifier
**"Anchors: High-Precision Model-Agnostic Explanations"**
Extends LIME by providing high-precision explanations
**"A Survey of Methods for Explaining Black Box Models"**
Surveys various methods for explaining black box machine learning models
**"Grad-CAM: Visual Explanations from Deep Networks via Gradient-based Localization"**
Introduces Grad-CAM, a technique for producing visual explanations for decisions from convolutional neural networks

author.literal: **"The Mythos of Model Interpretability"** - Lipton, Z. C.

title: Discusses the complexities and challenges associated with model interpretability

author.literal: **"Interpretable and Pedagogical Examples"** - Kim, B., et al.

title: Proposes methods for generating interpretable examples for machine learning models
**"Learning to Explain: Datasets and Models for Identifying Valid Explanations"**
Discusses datasets and models aimed at generating valid explanations for model predictions

author.literal: **"Concept Bottleneck Models"** - Koh, P. W., et al.

title: Introduces concept bottleneck models that improve interpretability by predicting concepts before making final predictions
**"Interpretable and Explainable Deep Learning: A Survey"**
Surveys various methods and approaches for making deep learning models interpretable and explainable
**"The Building Blocks of Interpretability"**
Discusses the fundamental components that contribute to the interpretability of machine learning models
These articles should provide a solid foundation in understanding both the theoretical and practical aspects of machine reasoning and interpretable neural networks
